short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Advanced AI Medical Assistant for Doctors and Patients

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This extension allows to run LucasAI next to your EHR/EMR software in Chrome. The extension also support exchange of data between the EHR/EMR and LucasAI allowing to:
- grab patient data to automatically fill the New Encounter popup in LucasAI
- copy the medical note from LucasAI into the EHR software

What is LucasAI?

By harnessing the power of artificial intelligence, we're liberating healthcare professionals from the shackles of administrative drudgery, empowering them to reclaim their passion for patient care. From the frontlines of primary care to the intensity of the ER, and from hospitalists to specialists like gastroenterologists and cardiologists, our AI medical assistant is transforming the fabric of healthcare delivery. By automating documentation, unlocking ICD-10 codes, and illuminating CPT service codes, Lucas AI is reshaping the future of medicine - one patient encounter at a time.

Lucas AI is designed to effortlessly integrate with your Electronic Health Record (EHR) systems, streamlining your workflow and enhancing your productivity. While we don't require specific connectors for EHR integration, our innovative technology allows for a simple and efficient solution.

News

1.0.5: support for eMedicalPractice, improved integration with eClinicalWorks
1.0.4: support for PointClickCare EHR, initial support for eClinicalWorks
1.0.3: Dynamic mapping of a note
1.0.2: fixed issues with AdvancedMD integration
1.0.1: initial support for AdvancedMD
